title: [Meazernis Villa, Private Lounge]
description: Surrounded in pale birch-paneled walls, this room is lit by a series of ensconced oil lanterns that dot the paneling at even intervals.  A wide glass-paned window further illuminates the room, bathing a linen-draped cherrywood table that rests before it with ample sunlight, glittering off the contents with bright golden light.  In one corner, a low stone fireplace faces a semi-circle of settees, offering a place to rest and regroup.   On one wall, paintings of local flora and fauna hang above a linen-draped cherry oak sideboard laden with food, while a glass-paned silvery birch door leads out.
